skill.description.spellbound.accelerated: Each tick restores hunger equal to 2% of the caster's max mana.
skill.description.spellbound.afterglow: Enemies hit are marked with a glow for 5 seconds. While marked, they take 20% extra fire damage.
skill.description.spellbound.alternating: The discharge has a small chance to instantly kill the target. Does not work on target with more than twice the caster's current health. On failure, the caster takes damage equal to 5% of their max health.
skill.description.spellbound.amplify: Electric Charge can be held for 3 seconds to increase the damage up to 100%.
skill.description.spellbound.aqua_tread: Gain the ability to walk on water.
skill.description.spellbound.arcane_veng: Increases attack damage by 15% for 10 seconds after you block an attack.
skill.description.spellbound.aversion: Counter Magic reflects 100% of the spell damage back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.bait_and_sw: Enemies passing through a portal take 5 damage to health and mana.
skill.description.spellbound.blasphemy: When the caster is hit, applies Disease to the attacker for 3 seconds. 5 sec. cooldown
skill.description.spellbound.blinding_li: Enemies hit by the beam are blinded for 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.blink: Passing through the portals increases the caster's movement speed for 25 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.bloom: The blossom now activates immediately after casting.
skill.description.spellbound.burst_of_li: Instantly heals the caster 4 health upon activation.
skill.description.spellbound.catalepsy: Getting hit by the same mushroom twice petrifies the target for 4 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.cats_agilit: In cat form, the spirit gains increased movement speed.
skill.description.spellbound.chain_react: The discharge applies Electric Charge to all nearby enemies, including the caster. The secondary charge is discharged immediately.
skill.description.spellbound.charged_atm: Decreases shock-based Ruin spells' mana costs by 25% for 8 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.charged_rif: Each warp between portals charges the storm, increasing shock damage 1 up to a max of 5.
skill.description.spellbound.circle_of_l: When the spell ends, restores 7 - 15 mana back to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.cleansing_t: Removes a random negative effect from the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.combat_perc: Chance to dodge a melee attack.
skill.description.spellbound.concentrate: After 5 seconds of hitting the same target, the damage doubles.
skill.description.spellbound.conjure_cat: Summons a totem spirit for 60 seconds. It changes between warrior form (fighting stance) and cat form (healing stance).
skill.description.spellbound.convalescen: Restores 1 health when the caster attack a target affected by poison or disease.
skill.description.spellbound.counter_mag: (Choice) Gain a magic shield that negates any spell cast on the caster for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.cyclone: Fire a tornado that blows away enemies with a 5-block radius for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.darkness_pr: Portals can be spawned in any light level.
skill.description.spellbound.decompose: Spores deal extra damage, scaling with the caster's current mana, to poisoned or diseased enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.discharge: Chance to disarm the target each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.disoriented: After the swap, the target gets dizzy and deals 20% less damage for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.displacemen: A single portal can now teleport enemies to a random location within 10 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.divine_bala: Increases the duration of the spell by 100% and the mana cost by 50%.
skill.description.spellbound.dual_destin: Can now deploy an additional portal. Order of travel goes by order placed.
skill.description.spellbound.eldritch_in: Restores caster's health to 50% if it drops below 20%. 2 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.electric_ch: Sneakily apply an electric charge to the target. Recast to discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.electrify: Decrease the target's shock resistance by 30%.
skill.description.spellbound.envenom: Spores now poison targets for 4 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.equilibrium: When you get hit, deals damage equal to 10% of your total health back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.eternal_spr: The healing duration is increased to 15 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.event_horiz: When a target is warped, they pull nearby enemies towards the warp field.
skill.description.spellbound.everlasting: Increases the duration of invisibility to 20 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.explosive_b: Each lava bomb explodes on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.expunge: Cast with a fool's shard to remove a spell from the target's knowledge. Can only be used once a day.
skill.description.spellbound.eye_of_the_: Caster can ride the Cyclone. Grants Slow Falling on dismount.
skill.description.spellbound.falling_deb: Cyclone occasionally picks up blocks, dealing damage on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.feral_fury: In cat form, the spirit gains increase attack damage and speed.
skill.description.spellbound.fleetfooted: Nearby allies gain 15% movement speed while near the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.flourishing: If the caster's health reaches full, the excess health is converted into 5 points of mana per second.
skill.description.spellbound.flower_fiel: Allies receive half the healing from the blossom.
skill.description.spellbound.forced_warp: Upon being warped, targets are launched out of the portal with a high velocity, potentially dealing damage on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.frostfront: Enemies caught take 4 frost damage per second and are have their movement speed slowed by 50%.
skill.description.spellbound.gale_force: The cyclones moves faster and last 5 seconds longer.
skill.description.spellbound.gravity_shi: Exiting the portal launches entities in the air, applying slow falling to the caster and allies, if applicable.
skill.description.spellbound.hailstorm: Casting Cyclone triggers a hailstorm (requires both Static Charge and Frostfront).
skill.description.spellbound.hastened_gr: Decreases the explosion interval by 1 second.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_blo: Plants a divine blossom. The blossom blooms 10 seconds after casting and last 10 seconds. The blossom heals the caster 2 health per seconds when within 5 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_lig: Allies hit by the ray are healed for 2 health per second.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_str: Each tick restores extra health equal to 2% of the caster's max mana.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_tou: Heals the caster 3 health per second for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_win: The blossom now follows the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.high_voltag: Recast with a storm shard to stun the target for 2 seconds. Enemies that come in range of the target are also stunned. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.implosion: Recast while targeting a portal with a storm shard to detonate the portal, applying Stormstrike to anyone in the area.
skill.description.spellbound.inferno_cor: After the eruption ends, the volcano drops a Smoldering Shard.
skill.description.spellbound.lava_flow: Lava bombs turn into lava pools on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.living_shad: After the swap, the caster remains invisible for another 5 seconds and leaves behind a decoy for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.maelstrom: Increases the max stack size of Cyclone from 3 to 6.
skill.description.spellbound.magic_poiso: Mana is reduced by 20 points for each active spell purged.
skill.description.spellbound.magnetic_fi: The vortex has twice the pull strength. Enemies caught in the field have their armor reduced by 25%.
skill.description.spellbound.momentum: For each second travelled, your attack speed is increased by 4%, up to a max of 20%, for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.motion_sick: Warped enemies have their movement, attack, and mining speed reduced by 40% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.mystic_armo: Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 60 seconds (+3% per level on the Transfiguration Path, up to 30% max).
skill.description.spellbound.natures_dom: Each active mushroom increases the spell's damage by 10%.
skill.description.spellbound.natures_tou: Instantly restores 4 health to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.nine_lives: If the spirit is killed, it will instantly revive with 50% health (only once per summoning).
skill.description.spellbound.nullificati: Removes a random enchantment from the target's armor or weapon.
skill.description.spellbound.oak_blessin: Increases armor by 15% for 10 seconds if the caster's health drops below 30% while Healing Touch is active. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.observant: The target is outlined to the caster while invisible.
skill.description.spellbound.open_invita: Anyone can pass through the portals.
skill.description.spellbound.orbital_she: Recast while targeting a portal with a shard to mark a portal. Marked portals will move in a 3-block radius circle centered around the origin.
skill.description.spellbound.oscillation: Increases the discharge damage by 5% for each storm shard in the caster's inventory. All shards are destroyed on discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.overgrowth: While at full health, each tick applies a stack of Overgrowth (up to a max of 5 stacks.) When hit, Overgrowth restores 4 health, consuming 1 stack.
skill.description.spellbound.overheat: After using Solar Ray for 5 seconds, the caster emits intense heat, dealing 3 fire damage per seconds to nearby enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.overpower: Gain the ability to slowly move while casting Solar Ray.
skill.description.spellbound.planar_defl: Deflects 30% of melee damage taken back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.poison_esse: If a target dies to a mushroom, the spell deals 25% more damage for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.power_of_th: Solar Ray deals 50% more damage during the day.
skill.description.spellbound.primal_resi: In cat form, the spirit's regenerate +5% of its max health.
skill.description.spellbound.pulsation: Chance to paralyze the target for 1 second each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.purge: Deals extra damage to summoned targets, equal to 10% of the caster's current mana.
skill.description.spellbound.purge_magic: Stops all of the targets active spells.
skill.description.spellbound.quick_recha: The caster receives 20 mana any time someone passes through a portal.
skill.description.spellbound.quick_sprin: For the first 10 seconds, movement speed is increased by an additional 15%.
skill.description.spellbound.radio_waves: Purge Magic is now cast in an AoE.
skill.description.spellbound.reach: Double the range of the portals
skill.description.spellbound.rebirth: Mark a blossom with a holy shard. If the caster takes fatal damage near the blossom, half of their health is automatically restored.
skill.description.spellbound.recycled: When 3 mushrooms are active, gain increased mana regeneration.
skill.description.spellbound.refraction: When the target takes damage from your shock-based Ruin spells while affected with Stormstrike, restores 15 mana back to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.residual_di: Targets hit with Purge Magic have a 50% chance to fail spells cast within the next 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.reversal: After the swap, the caster can recast with a fool's shard within 5 seconds to swap back with the target.
skill.description.spellbound.riders_resi: All movement benefits are applied to mounts.
skill.description.spellbound.savage_leap: In warrior form, the spirit can perform a leap forward, knocking back all enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_chai: The spell can now affect an additional target. Swapping order is in the order of targets affected.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_esca: When the caster enters the portal below 50% health, they gain invisibility for 10 seconds after exiting.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_gate: Deploy 2 shadow portals (must be in a low light level), allowing passage in both directions with 50 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_step: After the swap, the caster's movement speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds
skill.description.spellbound.shadowbond: Caster and target gain invisibility for 10 seconds. When the invisibility is broken, the caster and target swap places.
skill.description.spellbound.shock_facto: Deals extra damage equal to 1% of your current mana each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.silent_exch: After the swap, the target is Silenced for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.snare: After the swap, the target is rooted.
skill.description.spellbound.sneak_attac: After the swap, the caster's first attack within 5 seconds deals 50% more damage.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_bore: The end of the Solar Ray opposite of the caster explodes once per second, setting the ground ablaze.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_burst: Every 3 seconds, both ends of the beam release a small solar burst that deals an additional 3 fire damage around both areas.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_ray: Fire a thin beam of light that deals 5 fire damage per second.
skill.description.spellbound.soul_rechar: Restores you to full health if your health drops below 10%, consuming a filled soul shard in the caster's inventory. 3 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.stampede: You can charge through enemies, knocking them back and dealing 3 damage.
skill.description.spellbound.static_char: Enemies caught take 4 shock damage per second
skill.description.spellbound.static_shoc: Hitting a block now creates a small explosion that applies Stormstrike to anyone it hits.
skill.description.spellbound.stealth_tac: In cat form, the spirit will turn invisible for 7 seconds if its health drops below 25%. 1 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_calle: Generate a cloud above both portals that discharge lightning periodically dealing for 5 shock damage.
skill.description.spellbound.piezoelectr: If killed by Electric Charge, the enemy drops a storm shard. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_fury: The vortex doubles in size and damage.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_rift: Creates a storm portal for 20 seconds. If two portals are active, those approaching either get warped across and take 5 shock damage to health and mana.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_shard: If the target dies while affected by Stormstrike, the caster is awarded a Storm Shard. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_surge: If killed by Electric Charge, 10 to 20 mana is restored to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.stormstrike: Send out a bolt of lightning that charges a target, dealing 2 shock damage per second for 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.stride: Movement speed is increased by 25% for 30 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.sublime_bea: Restores health equal to 25% of your armor points every 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.sunshine: Doubles the range of Solar Ray.
skill.description.spellbound.supercharge: If the target dies while affected by Stormstrike, increases the damage of shock-based Ruin spells by 50% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.superconduc: Decreases target's shock resistance by 33% for 10 seconds on discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.synthesis: If a target dies to a mushroom, the casting cost of the spell is decreased by 100% for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.thorny_vine: Enemies within the range of the blossom take 4 damage per second.
skill.description.spellbound.totemic_arm: In warrior form, the spirit receives an armor buff that reduces physical damage by 25%.
skill.description.spellbound.totemic_bon: The caster receives a portion of the spirit's healing while in cat form.
skill.description.spellbound.tranquility: Each tick restores 2 points of mana to the caster
skill.description.spellbound.twin_spirit: The caster gains the ability to summon a second spirit, allowing for two spirits to fight simultaneously - one in warrior form, the other in cat form.
skill.description.spellbound.unfocused: Reduces the target's spell power by 10% for 20 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.unleashed_s: If killed by Electric Charge, the target will explode dealing half the base shock damage.
skill.description.spellbound.unwanted_gu: Enemies that pass through a portal have their attack and spell damage reduced by 10%.
skill.description.spellbound.verdant_ren: Cleanses all negative effects from the caster
skill.description.spellbound.volcano: Create a volcanic eruption that spits out 8 lava bombs per second for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.vortex: Cyclones can combine to increase the size and push/pull range. Can stack up to 3 times.
skill.description.spellbound.warriors_ro: In warrior form, the spirit can let out a roar that increases ally attack damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.whirling_te: The tornado now pulls enemies towards the center before launching them.
skill.description.spellbound.wild_mushro: Plants a wild mushroom at the target location, expelling poisonous spores every 3 seconds, dealing 2 damage to all nearby enemies.
